column4: does anybody know how to connect to the internet from a laptop through a phone that's connected via bluetooth and from the phone to a wi-fi network
i got the laptop to connect to the phone using blueman now just need to make it use WIFI instead of 3G
Whether it can be done depends on the 'phone.  Your best bet is to google for "<phone model> ubuntu wifi tethering".
thanks for the advice I'll check it out, if it's possible at all then I'm sure my phone will be able to
